00042 class MC2Coordinate {
00043 public:
00047    MC2Coordinate()
00048          : lat(MAX_INT32), lon(MAX_INT32) {
00049    }
00050 
00051    explicit MC2Coordinate(const Nav2Coordinate& nav2coord );
00052 
00056    explicit MC2Coordinate( const WGS84Coordinate& wgsCoord );
00057 
00066    MC2Coordinate( int32 latValue, int32 lonValue )
00067          : lat(latValue), lon(lonValue) {
00068    }
00069 
00073    int32 lat;
00074 
00078    int32 lon;
00079 
00085    bool isValid() const {
00086       return ( lat <= MAX_INT32/2 && lat >= int32(MIN_INT32)/2 );
00087    }
00088 
00101       bool operator== ( const MC2Coordinate& other ) const {
00102          return (lat == other.lat && lon == other.lon);
00103       }
00104 
00111       bool operator!= ( const MC2Coordinate& other ) const {
00112          return (lat != other.lat || lon != other.lon);
00113       }
00114 
00121       bool operator> ( const MC2Coordinate& other ) const {
00122          if ( lat > other.lat ) {
00123             return true;
00124          } else if ( lat == other.lat ) {
00125             return (lon > other.lon);
00126          } else {
00127             return false;
00128          }
00129       }
00130 
00137       bool operator< ( const MC2Coordinate& other ) const {
00138          if ( lat < other.lat ) {
00139             return true;
00140          } else if ( lat == other.lat ) {
00141             return (lon < other.lon);
00142          } else {
00143             return false;
00144          }
00145       }
00147 
00155    friend ostream& operator<< ( ostream& stream,
00156                                 const MC2Coordinate& coord )
00157    {
00158       return stream << "(" << coord.lat << "," << coord.lon << ")";
00159    }
00160 
00166    static const MC2Coordinate invalidCoordinate;
00167    
00168 public:
00169    
00174    class XYHelper {
00175    public:
00177       int32 getX( const MC2Coordinate& coord ) const {
00178          return coord.lon;
00179       }
00181       int32 getY( const MC2Coordinate& coord ) const {
00182          return coord.lat;
00183       }
00185       int32 getX( const MC2Coordinate* coord ) const {
00186          return coord->lon;
00187       }
00189       int32 getY( const MC2Coordinate* coord ) const {
00190          return coord->lat;
00191       }
00192    };
00193 protected:
00195    MC2Coordinate( bool ) {}
00196 };
